parameters.name: createFromTypes
parameters.description: The type of source to create from.

parameters.name: deployStatuses
parameters.description: The deployment status of the MCP server.

parameters.name: nameLike
parameters.description: The name to perform a fuzzy search on the MCP server.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to return. Pages start from 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of the MCP server.
